title: clef: different ledger live account start
body:
While looking into #28516 I noticed that the output for ledger live doesn't match Metamask. I'm not sure if we're following the ledger live derivation correctly and mm is off-piste or it's us.

Seems to be off by only one account.


You mean 0x34..? It's there, just not with the others
